sentences.english: Pillowed upon my fair love's ripening breast.
sentences.chinese: 以頭枕在愛人酥軟的胸脯上。

sentences.english: Finally, we use our sweet hearts to soften their bodies.
sentences.chinese: 最後，用酥軟的心去潤澤他的身體。

sentences.english: The feathered glory from her loosening thighs?
sentences.chinese: 她酥軟的大腿上那雄姿勃勃的毛羽？

sentences.english: When I got out of the jacuzzi, I was limp as a noodle.
sentences.chinese: 我從浴缸裏出來時，渾身酥軟無力。

sentences.english: But also let's not forget the layers of soft yellow cheese.
sentences.chinese: 哦，還有那一層層酥軟的黃奶油。

definition: loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
a French-style bread, similar to a small baguette, commonly seen in Hong Kong and Macao
katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
